description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
NETWORKNET-33440 - MapiMessage.Save gives System.Format exception
NETWORKNET-33441 - Unique Id of Fetched appointment is not the same as original
NETWORKNET-33461 - Error in MailMessageTest.AddCalendarTest arises on odessa-tcba4a agent with Japanese locale
NETWORKNET-33473 - Issue in MailMessage Attachment if it contains Unicode characters
NETWORKNET-33475 - SmtpClient Initialization fails in Web applications using Aspose.Email for.NET 2.1.0.0
NETWORKNET-33480 - Blank Attachments When Creating PST Items From EML File
NETWORKNET-33485 - Outlook cannot open a PST created from another PST using Aspose.Email
NETWORKNET-33446 - Attachments in EMLX files get duplicated when processed using Aspose.Email
NETWORKNET-33450 � Contact with certificate is not extracted correctly from the PST
NETWORKNET-33451 � EML files are added to PST using Aspose.Email. Outlook crashes while opening these EMLs folder
NETWORKNET-33454 � Object Reference not set to an Instance of Object Exception with MailMessage.Load and MapiMessage.FromFile
NETWORKNET-33463 � Specific to laposte.net Mail Server - Email body contents are disturbed after attachments are added to the MailMessage
NETWORKNET-33477 � Messages extracted from PST are corrupted - .NET
NETWORKNET-33283 � Investigate possibility and add missed Xml Comments for API methods from Aspose.Email.Exchange.Schema
Enhancement
NETWORKNET-33361 - Access to IMAP servers using OAuth
NETWORKNET-33437 - Some formatting issues

summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
